Title: Christmas Scandal
Plot: Leslie designs the Pawnee Winter Wonderland Festival, but has to hide from the press when a meeting with a disgraced Councilman lands her in the middle of a sex scandal. Meanwhile, Ron offers to cover for Leslie for the day, and quickly discovers how much work she really does.
GuestStars: Louis C.K., Pamela Reed, Kevin Symons, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Gillian Vigman, Phil Reeves, Mo Collins
